install.name: JA Content Scroll
install.author: JoomlArt
install.description:
JA Content Scroll


Scroll your contents with category.
Future:
This module will display your content in a scroll. you can use this module like a scroll bar to view your content list.
You can:
- Scroll your content with your width and height properties.
- You can set the number of content will display in a tab.
- You can set the categories contents will display.
- You can set display title, link title, introtext, read more text links or not.
- If your site hadn't import mootools.v1.1 so to run this module you have to remove all comment characters in code On line 78 in mod_ja_contentslide.php file to import mootools v1.1

param.name: mootools
param.label: Include Mootools library
param.description: This module requires Mootools v1.1x library to function. If your page does include the mootools library, you don't need include it again.

param.name: addstyle
param.label: Add style?
param.description: Add style of this module in mod_ja_contentscroll/mod_ja_contentscroll/ja._contentscroll.css?

param.name: autoresize
param.label: Auto resize images
param.description: Defines auto resize images is yes or no.

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: Select category which you want to display. if you want to display more than one category you can set like 1,2,32,5

param.name: numchar
param.label: Number Characters
param.description: number of Characters will display. Set 0 to unlimited

param.name: xheight
param.label: Height of div
param.description: Height of the div will display

param.name: xwidth
param.label: Width of div
param.description: Width of the div will display

param.name: iheight
param.label: Height of image
param.description: Height of the image will display

param.name: iwidth
param.label: Width of image
param.description: Width of the image will display
